ComicInfo.Summary:
FeFo#53 With special permission, Tara Fremont takes leave to return to her roots and help an old college friend on a project in Florida's Everglades. When she arrives, she finds the locals terrorized by a giant monstrosity that turns out to be none other than the Frightenstein(formerly Frankenstein) monster!! Transfixed by Tara's beauty, she is able to escape the beast and save her friend. "Woman...Unn...Good" is written by Bill Black, drawn by Dick Ayers, and inked by Chad Hunt and Mark Heike. Guest starring Buckaroo Betty. And in the backup, Hildalgo Romero's gonzo journalism leads Jennifer to the mistaken conclusion that husband David Burke is involved with Stardust. This may be the final indcident to break up the Burke's marriage. "Two Sided Triangle" is written and inked by Mark Heike, and pencilled by Richard Pollard. (His first assignment for AC.) It guest stars Bulldog Deni, Miss Masque, The Avenger, General Gordon, Captain Tom Kelly, and Jetgirl. Also- photo coverage of the AC staff visit to the 1992 San Diego Comic Con. Color cover by Bill Black and Mark Heike, interiors are black and white with graytones. Standard comic book format.
